DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Albumin Bound Paclitaxel With 5-FU CF Second Line Taxanes Naive Advanced Gastric Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma stomach inoperable locally advanced recurrent and/or metastatic disease . Male female . Age 18 75 . Previous one line nontaxane chemotherapy advanced/metastatic disease . Measurable disease , accord Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumours ( RECIST ) ECOG Performance status 0 , 1 2 Haematological , Biochemical Organ Function : Neutrophil count > 2.0 × 10 9/L , platelet count > 100 ×10 9/L . Serum bilirubin < 1.5 × upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; , AST ALT < 2.5 × ULN ( < 5 × ULN patient liver metastasis ) ; , alkaline phosphatase < 2.5 × ULN ( > 5 × ULN patient liver metastasis , Creatinine clearance > 60 mL/min . Signed informed consent . No prior chemotherapy gastric cancer . Received investigational drug treatment within 30 day start study treatment . Patients active gastrointestinal bleeding . Neurological toxicity ≥ grade 2 NCICTCAE . Other malignancy within last 5 year , except carcinoma situ cervix , basal cell carcinoma . History clinical evidence brain metastasis . Serious uncontrolled systemic intercurrent illness , e.g . infection poorly control diabetes . Pregnancy woman . Subjects reproductive potential willing use effective method contraception . Patients know active infection HIV . Known hypersensitivity study drug
